description:
Zoobles Car Race: Chevy and her friends went to the Rainbow Fountain to drink some water until they saw the Black Candies driving some sort of new car. They again challenge the three to a race throughout Candy Land, which she agrees. As they consulted to Winny about the race and provided them a car, it`s gonna be an all out race throughout Candy Land. As the race heats up, the Black Candies cheats.
Welcome to the Candy Factory: One day, Chevy and Coron went to see Panky as they go practice for a soccer tournament in Candy Land. But to them having short of one member they asked Q`n, a Papaya Flavored Monkey Zooble if she can help. After a while, they encountered Panna once more as she gave them a hands on until they encounter the Black Candies and teased the trio, especially to him. Panky decided to practice hard by himself, but later on Chevy noticed Panky`s getting clumsier every time and is getting left behind. As he got lost, he then fell off the cliff and got badly injured, Chevy and the others comes to his aid, but saw him out cold and almost about to die. Because of this, they got no choice but to call Kumampa and bring him to the Candy Factory to heal him up, or else he will die.

titles.title: Zoobles Car Race / Welcome to the Candy Factory
Zoobles Car Race / Youkoso, Candy Factory e!
ズーブルズ・カーレース / ようこそ, キャンディーファクトリーへ!
